title: Greek chickpea salad
ingredients: ['2 (400g) tins chickpeas, drained', '2 cucumbers, halved lengthways and sliced', '12 cherry tomatoes, halved', '1/2 red onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 (240g) jars sliced black olives, drained', '30g feta cheese, crumbled', '125ml Italian salad dressing or vinaigrette', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', 'salt to taste']
